project_plan.name: Python-based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, tracks their score, and displays the final score at the end of the game. Questions and answers will be stored within the code.

task.name: Define quiz questions and answers in a variable
Implement the quiz logic to present questions to the user
Track the user's score based on their answers
Display the final score at the end of the game
Write tests for the quiz game functionality
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
